title: Teen dead after accidentally shooting self
content:
ATLANTA (CBS46) -
A 17 year-old is dead after accidentally shooting himself at a home in southeast Atlanta late Sunday night.
The shooting happened around 10:15 p.m. at a home on the 1800 block of Charleston Avenue.
Not much is known about the incident but police say they don't believe it was the result of any kind of argument.
Other people were inside the home at the time of the shooting but it is unclear how many.
The identity of the deceased has not been released at this time.
Stay with CBS46 News for updates.
